meanings.definition: To grow different crops together in the same area for mutual benefit.
meanings.sent1: Farmers intercrops corn and beans to improve soil health.
meanings.sent2: She intercrops various vegetables in her garden to maximize space.
meanings.sent3: The fields intercrops happily under the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: The idea of intercropping seeds of friendship in the community.
meanings.sent5: Intercropping creates a beautiful tapestry of plants in the field.

meanings.definition: The crops grown together in the same area for mutual benefit.
meanings.sent1: Intercrops like corn and beans help each other grow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers practice intercrops to increase yield and reduce pests.
meanings.sent3: The intercrops in the garden whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The intercrops danced in harmony with the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The intercrops formed a colorful mosaic of agriculture in the field.
